content.rendered:
Client

G&J Moving is a Virginia based moving and storage company making over 2000 local and long distance moves per year. They provide end-to-end moving services to both residential and commercial clients.

Objective

Design and develop a web-based software to optimize long-distance shipment management, automate delivery planning and increase routes efficiency.

Solution

We created a cloud-based web application that integrates with multiple freight forwarding services, calculates most profitable delivery routes and delivers them via user-friendly interface to the client’s operations manager for execution.

Features include:

  • Automated shipments information ingest from various freight forwarding services
  • Ability to recognize over 100,000 variables
  • Delivery schedule planning using AI-powered proprietary algorithm
  • Integration with client’s in-house transport management system
  • Easy to use web user interface for accessing all components of the software

Result

Client’s operations department got a 30-40% boost in long-distance delivery planning efficiency. Route dispatcher now spends way less time looking for the best routes and instead focuses on quality shipment delivery execution.

excerpt.rendered: Logistics web application for delivery schedule planning.
